title: "Could Apple stock drop after iPhone launch event?"
text: "With Apple's (AAPL) iPhone 15 launch kicking off on Tuesday
source_name: the company's stock has historically proven to take a hit after its annual events. Yahoo Finance Markets Reporter Jared Blikre tracks Apple shares ahead of tomorrow

title: "Xbox Teams With Mastercard to Unveil First Credit Card"
text: "Microsoft-owned gaming platform Xbox is debuting its first co-branded credit card in the U.S. The Barclays-issued Mastercard
date: will be available on Sept. 21 exclusively to qualified Xbox Insiders across the country before becoming open to the general public in the U.S. starting next year."

title: "Amazon Vs. FTC: This One Scenario Should Scare Investors"
text: "The FTC is reportedly prepared to file a massive antitrust lawsuit against Amazon
source_name: potentially leading to the breakup of the conglomerate. However
date: there is just one scenario that should concern investors. How concerned should Amazon investors be
topics: and is the stock still a buy?"
